document.topic_text: Medical Conditions & Diseases » 6 or 8 weeks for bone healing 6 or 8 weeks for bone healing Asked Today, 09:48 PM How come sometimes they leave a cast on for 6 weeks and other times for 8 weeks? sara2020 Bone healing [ 2 Answers ] Broke both bone in my forearm completely. Had metal rods and screws installed how long before my bones are back to normal for lifting weights? Clarification whether is it bone spur or bone tumor [ 2 Answers ] Hello doctor, my mother(45+ years) has bone spur(tissue like projection) in the foot from the foot x-ray and scan taken. now I have a doubt that whether is it a bone tumor or bone spur. because sometimes she has fever, chills and little night sweat, vomiting and tenderness, swelling. Healing [ 9 Answers ] Recently Lord rebuked me for my sinful life. I am in the process of cleaning up. Hence battery of my faith is running low right now. I have asked Lord Jesus to recharge it. HE has hooked me up for a recharge free of cost:D. In the meantime a question came to my mind that how do non-Christians,... 38 weeks and want to rip my pubic bone out and a possible yeast infection? [ 7 Answers ] For the past almost three weeks my pubic bone has been very sore. The last couple of days have been the worst. I have been active this pregnancy, I exercise regularly and otherwise feel great. It's just this damn pubic bone is killing me. It hurts whether I am active or if I am laying down...
